comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: A Charles H. Thomas became president of the Chicago Cubs team in 1916.  I don't know if this is he.

comment.author: 90590054@N04
comment._content: yes this is a picture of my Grandfather, Charles H Thomas. I am his only grandchild, Roxanna J Thomas Ragozzino. I live in Oregon! My father was Frank Charles Thomas, born in Chicago in 1913!
